text: New Orleans Historic Voodoo Museum is a voodoo museum in New Orleans, United States, situated between Bourbon and Royal Streets in the centre of the French Quarter. Although only a small museum, consisting of two rooms, it is one of few museums in the world dedicated entirely to Vodou art. There is a voodoo priest on site giving readings. ==References== Category:African-American history in New Orleans Category:French Quarter Category:Louisiana Voodoo Category:Museums in New Orleans Category:Voodoo art Category:Religion in New Orleans
title: New Orleans Historic Voodoo Museum
